urls.title: Release is-land v3.0.0 ¬∑ 11ty/is-land
urls.description: Adds support for Declarative Shadow DOM #13 Thank you @e111077! Example demo Learn more at web.dev: Declarative Shadow DOM Notably, this does include a...

data.text:
Now shipping: <is-land> v3.0.0

Adds support for Declarative Shadow DOM, `defer-hydration` attribute, performance improvements on `<is-land>` without loading conditions.

Thank you @techytacos and @develwoutacause!

Learn more: https://t.co/exXJJLeSds

urls.title: Jamstack Community Survey Results 2022 | Jamstack
urls.description: The third annual Jamstack Survey conducted by Netlify reveals developer attitudes towards trends like remote work, Web3, serverless, edge and more.

data.text:
‚Äú11ty was the only purely static site generator (SSG) in our survey to show growth in usage share. For this reason we think 11ty is now the clear choice if a static site is your use case.‚Äù

urls.title: Unravel URL
urls.description: Unravel URL will get you orignal URL from shortened or tracking URLs. It comes handy when the tracking URL is blocked in your local network because of Ad blockers like Pi-hole or NextDNS. Remember those unsubscribe links that your Ad blocker blocks? I made this for them. UP tries to read the encoded URL in the URLs. If it couldn‚Äô t find a target URL, it would use fetch() to get one. All of these are done using Netlify Functions. No logs are kept. No usage analytic are collected.

data.text:
RT @saneef: @eleven_ty Tool to unblock locally blocked shortened or tracked URLs: https://t.co/4JEywbDj6a. 

Makes use of Eleventy Serverle‚Ä¶

RT @RyanCaoDev: This is why I use and love @eleven_ty.

Recent events have simply strengthened my support for it as a simple and powerful s‚Ä¶

urls.title: Enhance docs
urls.description: 11ty is an excellent minimalists√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢ static site generator. The @enhance/eleventy-plugin is a cool way to build completely static websites with basic HTML, and pure custom elements. You can deploy static sites to any place that supports HTML, CSS, and JavaScript which is every cloud vendor but the most popular choices for completely static sites are GitHub Pages, and Netlify. mkdir -p myproject cd myproject npm init -y npm install @11ty/eleventy @enhance/eleventy-plugin Add some handy shortcuts to scripts

urls.title: npm: performance-leaderboard
urls.description: A plugin to run Lighthouse against a set of urls to see which site is the fastest.. Latest version: 9.6.3, last published: 4 months ago. Start using performance-leaderboard in your project by running `npm i performance-leaderboard`. There are no other projects in the npm registry using performance-leaderboard.
